title: Queue times need to addressed
body:
If I play ranked, I usually get a queue time of about 5 minutes in Masters.

However, when I want to play normals draft, I get ridiculous queue times of about 10-20 minutes almost every single time. In the end, it just ends up matching me against low plats/diamond V's  with golds and plats on my team. If this is going to be the end-result 95% of the time, just match me with them immediately so that I don't have to waste 20 minutes in queue just to play a game that might be 20 minutes. It's normals for christ sakes, is there no way to stretch the mmr boundries so that more people get matched with each other?

Don't even get me started on normal 3's queue times.

I get a better quality match with a 5 minute queue time if I just go on my Diamond V smurf. The queue time is fast and everyone is around the same rank. Smh, and people wonder why smurfs exist. However, all I want is to play normals on my main where I have loads of skins, every champion, and 16 rune pages.

replies.body: Be a bro. queue as support and you will have 1 minute wait times.
False. I queued as fill in normals yesterday and had to wait 15 minutes in queue just to be filled into the support role. Still a really long queue time for a role that I didn't really want.

Don't queue fill, ACTUALLY do Support/Mid or something.
I'm a support main, and actually see my queue times RISE when I switch to Fill.
I'm wondering it Riot lowered the support bias of "fill" somewhere along the lines. Like the system will pass up games that need a support for a short while just to see if it can get you another role before just instantly forcing you to support the first open game it finds.
What can they do? They can't create new players to play with more players.

And want me to start about bronze queue timers?, 10-25 min in ranked. and you get bronze 5 players first timing vayne, etc. and waste 50 min ingame.
.
.
Edit: btw what the hell ? 5 min wait time in masters?.....

> [{quoted}](name=Freetyler1ritoo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=umETivhO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-04T10:28:46.092+0000)
>
> And want me to start about bronze queue timers?, 10-25 min in ranked. and you get bronze 5 players first timing vayne, etc. and waste 50 min ingame.
> .
> .
> Edit: btw what the hell ? 5 min wait time in masters?.....

How do you have 10-25min wait times? Lol, I used to have ~3 min wait times when I was bronze and now I'm having ~5 min wait times at silver 1
Day timing means a lot too. If you play in the morning or during work/school hours, there are much fewer players to fill games up with.

> [{quoted}](name=DLTD Stuart,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=umETivhO,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-04T10:40:47.475+0000)
>
> How do you have 10-25min wait times? Lol, I used to have ~3 min wait times when I was bronze and now I'm having ~5 min wait times at silver 1

Ask rito, 3 min in bronze? damn i hope i have ur luck
Feelsbadman. I mean you have 5 minute queue times in ranked at least...

What the hell are you queuing up as to get 5 minute wait times in Masters? That's insane.

It takes 10-20 minutes pretty often for me to get matched in high diamond and about 5 minutes to 10 minutes in low diamond.

Normals tho, yah, you get your normal MMR to above 2000 and you just get fucked. Its gonna be a 20 minute wait or more. Part of the problem is just how many players stopped playing the game this season. Less players in all queues means longer wait times. Tends to happen when you make changes that no one liked, that we all bitched about, that destroyed competitive integrity, and costs the game 20% of its player base in a single season.
